Trade/Device Name(s): Clever Choice Voice+ Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Clever Choice Voice+ Blood Glucose Monitoring System, model TD-4248
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Clever Choice Voice+ Blood Glucose meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Clever Choice Voice+ Blood Glucose Monitoring System, a home-use glucose meter with voice guidance for visually impaired users.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from finger or specified alternative sites; for people with diabetes mellitus at home as an aid in monitoring diabetes control; includes voice instructions to aid visually impaired persons; not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes or use on neonates.
